posts.title: My First Blog
posts.content: This is my first blog post in my own portfolio website. This website is created as part of my Master's module Software Evolution. In this I have used vite, react, Typescript, Api, json file data managememnt, css - flex, grid.

posts.title: Why modularization and refactoring important in software development
posts.content: Modularization is a important in any software application as it helps the developer to maintain the software easily and add new features to it without breaking the existing application
